import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import TopMenu from '../components/TopMenu' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { getAllConnectedPages, getConnectedPagesProject, getConnectedPagesPosts, removeProject, selectedPage } from '../actions' import PageCart from '../components/PageCart' import ButtonActiveted from '../components/ButtonActiveted' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Agent(props) { const [seletedPage, setSelectedPage] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { props.getallConnectedPage() .then(() => props.getPagePostProject()) }, []) const handelClick = (idPage) => { console.log(idPage) props.getPagePosts(idPage) .then(() => { const selectedPage = props.allConnectedPages.find(el => el.idPage == idPage) setSelectedPage(selectedPage) }) } const removePorjuctHandler = (idPost) => { const project = props.allProjects.find(el => el.post.idPost == idPost) props.removeProject(project) .then(() => props.getPagePostProject()) } return (

Pages connected

handelClick(props.allConnectedPages[el].idPage)} style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}>
)}

{el.hasOwnProperty('picture') ? : {el.hasOwnProperty('picture') ? : } {new Date(el.created_time).toLocaleDateString()}
{new Date(el.created_time).toLocaleTimeString()}		 Element.post.idPost == el.idPost)} allposts={props.allposts} seletedPage={seletedPage} agentPage={true} /> { props.allProjects.find(Element => el.idPost === Element.post.idPost).trained && }
}
) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { let posts = [] state.allPosts.forEach(el => { state.allProjects.forEach(Element => { if (Element.post.idPost == el.idPost) { posts.push(el) } }) }) console.log('posts has project ', posts) return { allConnectedPages: state.allConnectedPages, allposts: posts, allProjects: state.allProjects } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { getallConnectedPage: () => dispatch(getAllConnectedPages()), getPagePostProject: () => dispatch(getConnectedPagesProject()), getPagePosts: (pageid) => dispatch(getConnectedPagesPosts(pageid)), removeProject: (project) => dispatch(removeProject(project)) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Agent)
